meta.title: What did I learn this week (2021) - 32
meta.description: Weekly summarization and review of things I've learned in the first week of August 2021

pageProps.content:
• CalyxOs is a de-googled android alternative.
  • Started learning reactjs.
  • Started learning threejs from the very informative 'threejs fundamentals' site.
  • Came to know about Alvy Ray Smith and about the real history of Pixar.
